Articles.Content: Hello Im having troubles with the thrusters, im a complete noob so idk whats going on but I have 3 fuel tanks for 3 thrusters and I activate sas upon take off and everything goes smoothly, the rocket goes straight up, but as soon as a new fuel tank kicks in the whole rocket starts spinning out of control as if sas turned off and I end up never making it out of orbit. Maybe its a stupid mistake by me but can some one give me an idea of what I\'m doing wrong its very frustrating since the design is simple and should work just for a relatively low altitude.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Could you attach your rocket or maybe a photo?

It sounds like you center of mass is changing from fuel being used up causing the rocket to become unstable.

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
I figured it out thanks anyway, just needed a high speed before I actived the additional fuel tanks.
